page.title: 16Aycliffe Leisure Facilities
page.content: There are 2 main centres in Aycliffe providing a vast range of facilities and catering for the needs of everyone young,old,fit,unfit,able,and disabled. {Newton Aycliffe Leisure Centre: massive main sports hall,practice sports hall,entertainment hall,main swimming pool,teaching pool,fitness training multi-gym,4 squash courts, 4 meeting/club rooms,sauna,lounge,bar, vending/cafe area. {Aycliffe Sports and Leisure Complex: 4 squash courts,badminton,indoor cricket,5-a-side football,indoor bowling green,9-hole golf course, angling pond,running track,camp site. The town also has an{equestrian {centre, parks, playing fields}and{play {areas. Many private organisations offer activities ranging from karate to ballroom dancing and roller skating to sub-aqua experience.
